name: The Anomaly (pepero8)
description:
This game is an asymmetrical multiplayer game where 4 players should survive and escape from a defective robot trying to kill the survivors. I managed to implement the theme 'bug' as a robot having an unexpected anomaly. The game is really simple and fast-paced(it has a time limit of 5 minutes).

I hope you enjoy this game(and hope the server works) and any feedback is welcome!

You can view the source codes here

How To Play

Survivor

Search for a card key hidden in one of the boxes on the map. You can interact with the boxes. Once you've(or any other player) found the key, open the entrance gate located at the north and escape the facility.

Robot

Keep remaining survivors from escaping the facility. Or Eliminate all the survivors

Controls

Survivor

  • move with Arrow Keys or WASD
  • SHIFT : dodge
  • E : interact with objects

Robot

  • move with Arrow Keys or WASD
  • SHIFT : rush
  • right-click : grab
  • left-click : attack
